speaker: Ewa Tomaszewska (UEN). -
english: Ewa Tomaszewska (UEN). - (PL) Mr President, complaints concerning the organisation of working time are matters of urgency. Consider what may happen if working time rules are breached in the case of doctors: that could lead to a surgeon having to perform a complicated operation after being duty for 23 hours. There is a whole series of professions in which improper organisation of working time can endanger life. It is therefore of exceptional importance that complaints be acted on within a reasonable time.
